cab.content: DOCUMENT is THE PROPERTY OP HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY1 S GOVERNMENT) ; R E I.C A BINE T. HOUSING POLICY.The Prime Minister desires that the following" Committee shall meet to examine the question of general Housing Policy:-Sir A, Griffith-Boscawen (Chairman) Lord Kovar,Mre Neville Chamberlain. Mr, J.W. Hills, Sir Douglas Hogg.(Signed) M.P.A. HANKEY,Secretary, Cabinet.2, Whitehall Gardens, S.W. 6th December, 1922a
